title: Installation issue: py-pyqt4
body:
<!-- Thanks for taking the time to report this build failure. To proceed with the report please:

1. Title the issue "Installation issue: <name-of-the-package>".
2. Provide the information required below.

We encourage you to try, as much as possible, to reduce your problem to the minimal example that still reproduces the issue. That would help us a lot in fixing it quickly and effectively! -->

### Steps to reproduce the issue

<!-- Fill in the exact spec you are trying to build and the relevant part of the error message -->
```console
$ spack install -v py-pyqt4
...
7 errors found in build log:
  >> 3      Error: Unable to create the C++ code.
     4      Querying qmake about your Qt installation...
     5      Determining the details of your Qt installation...
     6      /home/spack/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos8-aarch64/gcc-8.3.1/qt-4.8.7-pgnv6hx2gkpfuczxehpprv4mn553em2o/bin/qmake -o qtdetail.mk qtdetail.pro
     7      make -f qtdetail.mk
     8      c++ -c -pipe -std=gnu++98 -O2 -Wall -W -D_REENTRANT -DQT_NO_DEBUG -DQT_CORE_LIB -DQT_SHARED -I/home/spack/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos8-aarch64/gcc-8.3
            .1/qt-4.8.7-pgnv6hx2gkpfuczxehpprv4mn553em2o/mkspecs/linux-g++ -I. -I/home/spack/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos8-aarch64/gcc-8.3.1/qt-4.8.7-pgnv6hx2gkpfu
            czxehpprv4mn553em2o/include/QtCore -I/home/spack/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos8-aarch64/gcc-8.3.1/qt-4.8.7-pgnv6hx2gkpfuczxehpprv4mn553em2o/include -I.
            -o qtdetail.o qtdetail.cpp
     9      c++ -Wl,-O1 -Wl,-rpath,/home/spack/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos8-aarch64/gcc-8.3.1/qt-4.8.7-pgnv6hx2gkpfuczxehpprv4mn553em2o/lib -o qtdetail qtdetail.o
                -L/home/spack/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos8-aarch64/gcc-8.3.1/qt-4.8.7-pgnv6hx2gkpfuczxehpprv4mn553em2o/lib -lQtCore -L/home/spack/spack/opt/spack/
            linux-centos8-aarch64/gcc-8.3.1/openssl-1.0.2u-7ydqegldhr3r2vquvl2gi65s27x3jrvv/lib -L/home/spack/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos8-aarch64/gcc-8.3.1/qt-4.
            8.7-pgnv6hx2gkpfuczxehpprv4mn553em2o/lib -lpthread

     ...

     67     c++ -c -pipe -std=gnu++98 -O2 -Wall -W -D_REENTRANT -DQT_NO_DEBUG -DQT_TESTLIB_LIB -DQT_GUI_LIB -DQT_CORE_LIB -DQT_SHARED -I/home/spack/spack/opt/spack
            /linux-centos8-aarch64/gcc-8.3.1/qt-4.8.7-pgnv6hx2gkpfuczxehpprv4mn553em2o/mkspecs/linux-g++ -I. -I/home/spack/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos8-aarch64/gc
            c-8.3.1/qt-4.8.7-pgnv6hx2gkpfuczxehpprv4mn553em2o/include/QtCore -I/home/spack/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos8-aarch64/gcc-8.3.1/qt-4.8.7-pgnv6hx2gkpfucz
            xehpprv4mn553em2o/include/QtGui -I/home/spack/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos8-aarch64/gcc-8.3.1/qt-4.8.7-pgnv6hx2gkpfuczxehpprv4mn553em2o/include/QtTest
            -I/home/spack/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos8-aarch64/gcc-8.3.1/qt-4.8.7-pgnv6hx2gkpfuczxehpprv4mn553em2o/include -I. -o cfgtest_QtTest.o cfgtest_QtTest.
            cpp
     68     c++ -Wl,-O1 -Wl,-rpath,/home/spack/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos8-aarch64/gcc-8.3.1/qt-4.8.7-pgnv6hx2gkpfuczxehpprv4mn553em2o/lib -o cfgtest_QtTest cfgt
            est_QtTest.o    -L/home/spack/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos8-aarch64/gcc-8.3.1/qt-4.8.7-pgnv6hx2gkpfuczxehpprv4mn553em2o/lib -lQtTest -L/home/spack/spac
            k/opt/spack/linux-centos8-aarch64/gcc-8.3.1/openssl-1.0.2u-7ydqegldhr3r2vquvl2gi65s27x3jrvv/lib -L/home/spack/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos8-aarch64/gcc
            -8.3.1/qt-4.8.7-pgnv6hx2gkpfuczxehpprv4mn553em2o/lib -lQtGui -L/usr/X11R6/lib -lQtCore -lpthread
     69     Checking to see if the QtWebKit module should be built...
     70     /home/spack/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos8-aarch64/gcc-8.3.1/qt-4.8.7-pgnv6hx2gkpfuczxehpprv4mn553em2o/bin/qmake -o cfgtest_QtWebKit.mk cfgtest_QtWebKit
            .pro
     71     make -f cfgtest_QtWebKit.mk
     72     c++ -c -pipe -std=gnu++98 -O2 -Wall -W -D_REENTRANT -DQT_NO_DEBUG -DQT_WEBKIT_LIB -DQT_GUI_LIB -DQT_NETWORK_LIB -DQT_CORE_LIB -DQT_SHARED -I/home/spack
            /spack/opt/spack/linux-centos8-aarch64/gcc-8.3.1/qt-4.8.7-pgnv6hx2gkpfuczxehpprv4mn553em2o/mkspecs/linux-g++ -I. -I/home/spack/spack/opt/spack/linux-ce
            ntos8-aarch64/gcc-8.3.1/qt-4.8.7-pgnv6hx2gkpfuczxehpprv4mn553em2o/include/QtCore -I/home/spack/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos8-aarch64/gcc-8.3.1/qt-4.8.7
            -pgnv6hx2gkpfuczxehpprv4mn553em2o/include/QtNetwork -I/home/spack/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos8-aarch64/gcc-8.3.1/qt-4.8.7-pgnv6hx2gkpfuczxehpprv4mn553
            em2o/include/QtGui -I/home/spack/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos8-aarch64/gcc-8.3.1/qt-4.8.7-pgnv6hx2gkpfuczxehpprv4mn553em2o/include/QtWebKit -I/home/spa
            ck/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos8-aarch64/gcc-8.3.1/qt-4.8.7-pgnv6hx2gkpfuczxehpprv4mn553em2o/include -I. -o cfgtest_QtWebKit.o cfgtest_QtWebKit.cpp
  >> 73     cfgtest_QtWebKit.cpp:1:10: fatal error: qwebpage.h: No such file or directory
     74      #include <qwebpage.h>
     75               ^~~~~~~~~~~~
     76     compilation terminated.
  >> 77     make: *** [cfgtest_QtWebKit.mk:207: cfgtest_QtWebKit.o] Error 1
     78     Checking to see if the QtXml module should be built...
     79     /home/spack/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos8-aarch64/gcc-8.3.1/qt-4.8.7-pgnv6hx2gkpfuczxehpprv4mn553em2o/bin/qmake -o cfgtest_QtXml.mk cfgtest_QtXml.pro
     80     make -f cfgtest_QtXml.mk
     81     c++ -c -pipe -std=gnu++98 -O2 -Wall -W -D_REENTRANT -DQT_NO_DEBUG -DQT_XML_LIB -DQT_CORE_LIB -DQT_SHARED -I/home/spack/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos8-aa
            rch64/gcc-8.3.1/qt-4.8.7-pgnv6hx2gkpfuczxehpprv4mn553em2o/mkspecs/linux-g++ -I. -I/home/spack/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos8-aarch64/gcc-8.3.1/qt-4.8.7-
            pgnv6hx2gkpfuczxehpprv4mn553em2o/include/QtCore -I/home/spack/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos8-aarch64/gcc-8.3.1/qt-4.8.7-pgnv6hx2gkpfuczxehpprv4mn553em2o
            /include/QtXml -I/home/spack/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos8-aarch64/gcc-8.3.1/qt-4.8.7-pgnv6hx2gkpfuczxehpprv4mn553em2o/include -I. -o cfgtest_QtXml.o c
            fgtest_QtXml.cpp
     82     c++ -Wl,-O1 -Wl,-rpath,/home/spack/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos8-aarch64/gcc-8.3.1/qt-4.8.7-pgnv6hx2gkpfuczxehpprv4mn553em2o/lib -o cfgtest_QtXml cfgte
            st_QtXml.o    -L/home/spack/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos8-aarch64/gcc-8.3.1/qt-4.8.7-pgnv6hx2gkpfuczxehpprv4mn553em2o/lib -lQtXml -L/home/spack/spack/o
            pt/spack/linux-centos8-aarch64/gcc-8.3.1/openssl-1.0.2u-7ydqegldhr3r2vquvl2gi65s27x3jrvv/lib -L/home/spack/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos8-aarch64/gcc-8.
            3.1/qt-4.8.7-pgnv6hx2gkpfuczxehpprv4mn553em2o/lib -lQtCore -lpthread
     83     Checking to see if the QtXmlPatterns module should be built...

     ...

     96     c++ -c -pipe -std=gnu++98 -O2 -D_REENTRANT -Wall -W -DQT_NO_DEBUG -DQT_SCRIPT_LIB -DQT_XML_LIB -DQT_GUI_LIB -DQT_CORE_LIB -DQT_SHARED -I/home/spack/spa
            ck/opt/spack/linux-centos8-aarch64/gcc-8.3.1/qt-4.8.7-pgnv6hx2gkpfuczxehpprv4mn553em2o/mkspecs/linux-g++ -I. -I/home/spack/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos
            8-aarch64/gcc-8.3.1/qt-4.8.7-pgnv6hx2gkpfuczxehpprv4mn553em2o/include/QtDesigner -I/home/spack/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos8-aarch64/gcc-8.3.1/qt-4.8.7
            -pgnv6hx2gkpfuczxehpprv4mn553em2o/include/QtCore -I/home/spack/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos8-aarch64/gcc-8.3.1/qt-4.8.7-pgnv6hx2gkpfuczxehpprv4mn553em2
            o/include/QtGui -I/home/spack/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos8-aarch64/gcc-8.3.1/qt-4.8.7-pgnv6hx2gkpfuczxehpprv4mn553em2o/include/QtXml -I/home/spack/spa
            ck/opt/spack/linux-centos8-aarch64/gcc-8.3.1/qt-4.8.7-pgnv6hx2gkpfuczxehpprv4mn553em2o/include/QtScript -I/home/spack/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos8-aar
            ch64/gcc-8.3.1/qt-4.8.7-pgnv6hx2gkpfuczxehpprv4mn553em2o/include -I. -o cfgtest_QtDesigner.o cfgtest_QtDesigner.cpp
     97     c++ -Wl,-O1 -Wl,-rpath,/home/spack/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos8-aarch64/gcc-8.3.1/qt-4.8.7-pgnv6hx2gkpfuczxehpprv4mn553em2o/lib -o cfgtest_QtDesigner
            cfgtest_QtDesigner.o    -L/home/spack/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos8-aarch64/gcc-8.3.1/qt-4.8.7-pgnv6hx2gkpfuczxehpprv4mn553em2o/lib -lQtScript -L/home/
            spack/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos8-aarch64/gcc-8.3.1/openssl-1.0.2u-7ydqegldhr3r2vquvl2gi65s27x3jrvv/lib -L/home/spack/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos8-a
            arch64/gcc-8.3.1/qt-4.8.7-pgnv6hx2gkpfuczxehpprv4mn553em2o/lib -lQtXml -lQtGui -L/usr/X11R6/lib -lQtCore -lQtDesigner -lpthread
     98     Checking to see if the QAxContainer module should be built...
     99     /home/spack/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos8-aarch64/gcc-8.3.1/qt-4.8.7-pgnv6hx2gkpfuczxehpprv4mn553em2o/bin/qmake -o cfgtest_QAxContainer.mk cfgtest_QAxC
            ontainer.pro
     100    make -f cfgtest_QAxContainer.mk
     101    c++ -c -pipe -std=gnu++98 -O2 -Wall -W -D_REENTRANT -DQT_NO_DEBUG -DQT_GUI_LIB -DQT_CORE_LIB -DQT_SHARED -I/home/spack/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos8-aa
            rch64/gcc-8.3.1/qt-4.8.7-pgnv6hx2gkpfuczxehpprv4mn553em2o/mkspecs/linux-g++ -I. -I/home/spack/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos8-aarch64/gcc-8.3.1/qt-4.8.7-
            pgnv6hx2gkpfuczxehpprv4mn553em2o/include/QtCore -I/home/spack/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos8-aarch64/gcc-8.3.1/qt-4.8.7-pgnv6hx2gkpfuczxehpprv4mn553em2o
            /include/QtGui -I/home/spack/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos8-aarch64/gcc-8.3.1/qt-4.8.7-pgnv6hx2gkpfuczxehpprv4mn553em2o/include -I. -o cfgtest_QAxContai
            ner.o cfgtest_QAxContainer.cpp
  >> 102    cfgtest_QAxContainer.cpp:1:10: fatal error: qaxobject.h: No such file or directory
     103     #include <qaxobject.h>
     104              ^~~~~~~~~~~~~
     105    compilation terminated.
  >> 106    make: *** [cfgtest_QAxContainer.mk:205: cfgtest_QAxContainer.o] Error 1
     107    Checking to see if the QtDBus module should be built...
     108    /home/spack/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos8-aarch64/gcc-8.3.1/qt-4.8.7-pgnv6hx2gkpfuczxehpprv4mn553em2o/bin/qmake -o cfgtest_QtDBus.mk cfgtest_QtDBus.pro
     109    make -f cfgtest_QtDBus.mk
     110    c++ -c -pipe -std=gnu++98 -O2 -Wall -W -D_REENTRANT -DQT_NO_DEBUG -DQT_DBUS_LIB -DQT_CORE_LIB -DQT_SHARED -I/home/spack/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos8-a
            arch64/gcc-8.3.1/qt-4.8.7-pgnv6hx2gkpfuczxehpprv4mn553em2o/mkspecs/linux-g++ -I. -I/home/spack/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos8-aarch64/gcc-8.3.1/qt-4.8.7
            -pgnv6hx2gkpfuczxehpprv4mn553em2o/include/QtCore -I/home/spack/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos8-aarch64/gcc-8.3.1/qt-4.8.7-pgnv6hx2gkpfuczxehpprv4mn553em2
            o/include/QtDBus -I/home/spack/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos8-aarch64/gcc-8.3.1/qt-4.8.7-pgnv6hx2gkpfuczxehpprv4mn553em2o/include -I. -o cfgtest_QtDBus.
            o cfgtest_QtDBus.cpp
  >> 111    cfgtest_QtDBus.cpp:1:10: fatal error: qdbusconnection.h: No such file or directory
     112     #include <qdbusconnection.h>
     113              ^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
     114    compilation terminated.
  >> 115    make: *** [cfgtest_QtDBus.mk:221: cfgtest_QtDBus.o] Error 1
     116    Checking to see if the dbus support module should be built...
     117    pkg-config --cflags-only-I --libs dbus-1
     118    DBus v1 does not seem to be installed.
     119    Qt v4.8.7 (Open Source) is being used.
     120    Qt is built as a shared library.
     121    SIP 4.19.21 is being used.

See build log for details:
  /tmp/root/spack-stage/spack-stage-py-pyqt4-4.12.3-hxagzc23opqpxy3pwp3ffw63ntlibpqs/spack-build-out.txt

```

### Information on your system

<!-- Please include the output of `spack debug report` -->

<!-- If you have any relevant configuration detail (custom `packages.yaml` or `modules.yaml`, etc.) you can add that here as well. -->

### Additional information
CPU_ARCH_SUFFIX = aarch64
CentOS Linux release 8.2.2004 (Core)
<!-- Please upload the following files. They should be present in the stage directory of the failing build. Also upload any config.log or similar file if one exists. -->
* [spack-build-out.txt]()
* [spack-build-env.txt]()

<!-- Some packages have maintainers who have volunteered to debug build failures. Run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and @mention them here if they exist. -->

### General information

<!-- These boxes can be checked by replacing [ ] with [x] or by clicking them after submitting the issue. -->
- [ ] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
- [ ] I have run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and @mentioned any maintainers
- [ ] I have uploaded the build log and environment files
- [ ] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
